scripts.postinstall: chmod +x .wrangler-deploy-wrapper.js .wrangler-versions-wrapper.js deploy.sh versions-upload.sh 2>/dev/null || true && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const binDir=path.join(__dirname,'node_modules','.bin');if(!fs.existsSync(binDir))fs.mkdirSync(binDir,{recursive:true});const wrapper=path.join(__dirname,'.wrangler-deploy-wrapper.js');const target=path.join(binDir,'wrangler');if(fs.existsSync(wrapper)){try{fs.unlinkSync(target);}catch(e){}}fs.symlinkSync(path.relative(binDir,wrapper),target,'file');"
